department.en: International Master of Business Administration program
department.ch: 國際經營管理碩士學位學程

goal.en: This course is aiming to expand students’ horizons and enhance interdisciplinary learning, instilling professionalism in future career by discerning, identifying, and following the trends to become an all-rounded leader with creativity, innovation, versatility, and ethical values.
goal.ch: IMBA希望可以培育出能廣泛應用於各商業領域之國際性人才，因此所學課程即跨多元領域。另一方面，本學程學生亦相對更期待或需要貼近業界及其實務工作內容，以提前了解市場需求，以選擇著重於IMBA四大核心領域其一，重點修讀專業課程。本學程規劃邀請以未來IMBA業師為主的講師，以演講分享工作經驗，給予學生就業建議，拓展學生眼界與人脈。本課程亦會安排學生前往企業參訪，實地走訪現場了解不同業種內涵，協助同學理解並形塑自己成為能與產業需求結合的管理領導人才。

content.en:
To synergize industrial practices/ experiences, resources from senior executives, insights from academic trainings, to sharpen the saw of the students. This course will incorporate the following contents, for example,
1. Talks of IMBA mentors and senior executives.
2. Corporate visits and networking opportunities.
3. Career planning and development.
IMBA students have to take Seminar in Business Management Practices I, II, III separately in 3 semesters of the study.
content.ch:

This course is aiming to expand students’ horizons and enhance interdisciplinary learning, instilling professionalism in future career by discerning, identifying, and following the trends to become an all-rounded leader with creativity, innovation, versatility, and ethical values.
IMBA students have to take Seminar in Business Management Practices I, II, III separately in 3 semesters of the study.

ch.competency: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

en: Department:International Master of Business Administration program only.Year:First Year only.
Department:International Master of Business Administration program only.
ch: 系所:限國際經營管理碩士學位學程。年級:限一年級。
